name: Unidentified_Rebel_sergeant_(Arbra)
content:
This sergeant was a Human male and a member of the Rebel Alliance stationed at Haven Base on Arbra.
He was one of the Rebels who worked on modifying the captured TIE/LN starfighters of the Flying Bantha Squadron. The sergeant explained the modifications to Commander Luke Skywalker shortly before his mission to attack Imperial Admiral Giel secret armada.
The sergeant's uniform strongly resembles early Rebel trooper concept art for Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope by Ralph McQuarrie. A similar trooper can be seen in the 1986 comic Droids 6 which features an alternate retelling of the film.
